Html:
Hello

The already very useful WPP client actions would be even better if It would be possible to start and stop the Windows Update client service. The client action "clean SoftwareDistribution directory" fails most of the time. But this action succeeds when the Windows update client service is stopped before.

Kind regards,
Franz

Hello, WPP already stop "Windows Update" service before trying to delete this folder.
Please, when you try to use this option and it failed, go to "Help" -> "Send debug info" and click on the "Show information" link at bottom/left.
Send me the content of the file at package.publisher@free.fr with a reference to this thread.
